Race.SpecificTitle: City Marshal -- City Court, Town of Vidalia
Justice of the Peace -- Justice of the Peace District 1
PW Law Enforcement District -- 12 Mills Renewal - Sheriff - 10 Yrs.
Race.FullText: Shall the Law Enforcement District of the Parish of Concordia, State of Louisiana (the "District"), levy a special tax of twelve (12) mills on all property subject to taxation within the District (an estimated $1,620,000 reasonably expected at this time to be collected from the levy of the tax for an entire year), for a period of ten (10) years, beginning with the year 2017 and ending with the year 2026, for the purpose of providing additional funding for the District?

Race.SpecificTitle: PW Proposition -- 10 Mills Renewal - PJ - 10 Yrs.
Race.FullText: Shall the Parish of Concordia, State of Louisiana (the "Parish"), levy a ten (10) mills tax (an estimated $1,350,000 reasonably expected at this time to be collected from the levy of the tax for an entire year) on all property subject to taxation in the Parish for a period of ten (10) years, beginning with the year 2018 and ending with the year 2027, for acquiring, constructing, improving, maintaining and/or operating public drainage works and improvements and public buildings and facilities in the Parish, including the acquisition and purchase of necessary equipment and materials for said purposes?

Race.SpecificTitle: Town of Vidalia -- 1% S&U Renewal - M&BOA - 18 Yrs.
Race.SummaryText:
Town of Vidalia Proposition
(Sales Tax Renewal)
Race.FullText: Shall the Town of Vidalia, State of Louisiana (the "Town"), under the provisions of Louisiana law, be authorized to levy and collect a tax of one percent (1%) (the "Tax") (an estimated $1,100,000 reasonably expected at this time to be collected from the levy of the Tax for an entire year) for a period of eighteen (18) years, commencing October 1, 2017, upon the sale at retail, the use, the lease or rental, the consumption, and the storage for use or consumption, of tangible personal property and on sales of services in the Town, all as defined by law, inclusive, with the proceeds of the Tax (after paying the reasonable and necessary expenses of collecting and administering the Tax), to be dedicated and used for acquiring, constructing, extending, improving, maintaining and/or operating public streets, drainage facilities, waterworks system facilities and improvements and sewerage system facilities and improvements, and shall the Town be further authorized to fund the proceeds of the Tax into bonds for any of the capital purposes set forth above to the extent and in the manner permitted by the laws of Louisiana?

Race.SpecificTitle: Monterey Fire Protection Dist. No. 1 -- 10 Mills Renewal - BOC - 10 Yrs.
Race.SummaryText:
Monterey Fire Protection District No. 1 Proposition
(Millage Renewal)
Race.FullText: Shall Monterey Fire Protection District No. 1 of the Parish of Concordia, State of Louisiana (the "District''), levy a special tax of ten (10) mills on all the property subject to taxation in the District (an estimated $102,190 reasonably expected at this time to be collected from the levy of the tax for an entire year), for a period of ten (10) years, beginning with the year 2017 and ending with the year 2026, for the purpose of acquiring, constructing, improving, maintaining and/or operating the District's fire protection facilities and equipment, including paying the cost of obtaining water for fire protection purposes?
